title: Manage Concession Staff Break
description: A concession stand worker needs to take their scheduled 30-minute break during a busy event.

tasks.description: Receive the break request from the staff member.
Identify an available 'floater' staff member who can cover the stand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available floater in the scheduling system.

tasks.description: Assign the floater to cover the stand for 30 minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the floater's assignment in the system.

tasks.description: Authorize the original staff member to take their break.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the staff member they are cleared for their break.
